name: A-tSNE
description: Approximated t-SNE: A method for constructing a low dimensional embedding of high-dimensional data. This method trades off accuracy for faster calculation speeds compared to standard t-SNE.

properties.name: exaggeration_iter
properties.description: Remove the exaggeration factor after <exaggeration_iter> iterations.

properties.name: theta
properties.description: Speed/accuracy trade-off (increase for less accuracy), set to 0.0 for exact TSNE
